snippet: The economy of Dannemora, N.Y., a town near the Canadian border, revolves around the Clinton Correctional Facility, the maximum-security prison from which two inmates escaped last week.
abstract: Dannemora Journal; residents of Dannemora, NY, describe their symbiotic relationship with local Clinton Correctional Facility, maxium-security prison that gained national notoriety following escape of two prisoners; town, located near Canadian border, is composed of many who work in or with the prison, and many others who moved there to be near incarcerated kin.

byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and RICK ROJAS

lead_paragraph: The economy of Dannemora, N.Y., a town near the Canadian border, revolves around the Clinton Correctional Facility, the maximum-security prison from which two inmates escaped last week.

headline.print_headline: ‘Everyone Has a Family Member Who Works Up There’
headline.main: ‘Everyone Has a Family Member Who Works Up There’
